page.title: 16Garden House.
page.content: Garden House lies on the southern outskirts of the village.It is a large detached house with a floor area of 2,500.sq.ft. and 13 rooms including the cellar.It was built between 1730 and 1784 and was at one time the home of the Dixon family.Named because it had spectacular gardens of 3 acres,it has lost 1 acre of ground at each side on which 2 modern bungalows have been built.Although the house has been modernised it's structure has not been altered.The old stone slates from the roof are now used as paving stones in the garden.The present owners who brought the house in Feb 1985 are very proud to own the home of such famous men and are anxious to find out more about the Dixons brothers.
